WINDSOR, Ontario( AP)-- Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made." The Defense Department pushed early on" to do what we'd done in Afghanistan"- where a tribal loya jirga had quickly anointed Hamid Karzai as leader. The goal was to move quickly to have an Iraqi face on the leadership in the country, as opposed to a foreign occupation.
